titleInfo.title: Discussion - Ron Cornelius, Charlie Daniels, Sylvie Simmons - 2015-04-04

mods.abstract: Songs from a Room: the Nashville Works of Bob Dylan and Leonard Cohen. Discussion with Nashville musicians Ron Cornelius and Charlie Daniels and music journalist/author Sylvie Simmons from the Ford Theater at the Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum on April 4, 2015. Presented in support of the exhibit Dylan, Cash, and the Nashville Cats: A New Music City.

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
